commit.message:
i386.c (ix86_delegitimize_address): Handle UNSPEC_PCREL plus displacement.

        * config/i386/i386.c (ix86_delegitimize_address): Handle
        UNSPEC_PCREL plus displacement.

From-SVN: r184560
